body:
Hey!! everyone I was thinking about Mczone Lobby!! We should celebrate Mczone Lobby!! for 7 Years SO FAR!!

Here a pic maybe u remember !!
Picture : http://imgur.com/a/GpbDq
See the purple wool for Ender_portal

so what think? should we use that mczone lobby in 1 day in news year 2017?

title: McZone

replies.body: We had an MCZone throwback lobby a few months ago for a month or two. It's sort of an annual thing, I believe. Besides, the current one looks better.
replies.body_tagged: We had an MCZone throwback lobby a few months ago for a month or two. It's sort of an annual thing, I believe. Besides, the current one looks better.

replies.body: 7 years? I feel like that's not right
replies.body_tagged: 7 years? I feel like that's not right

replies.body: Time flys. I remember playing MCZone since 6th grade (6 years ago).
replies.body_tagged: Time flys. I remember playing MCZone since 6th grade (6 years ago).

reply_to.body: 7 years? I feel like that's not right
reply_to.body_tagged: 7 years? I feel like that's not right

replies.body:
Keenan says that he started the minecraft server when he was 14, and he's around 18 now. It's only been 4 years.

Anyways, I like this! And I do remember that lobby, but I don't recall the Enders portals. At the time, I played on Tiny render distance so maybe that's why.

replies.body: What Badger said. ^ And I remember the lobby, I remember the end portals because I always tried to jump in them. Lol I only played Walls back then. Good times. :^)

replies.body: Correct me if I'm wrong but, mczone was 2011/2012 and terrascape was before that. So technically it has only been 4/5 years of mczone and like 6/7 for terrascape, or whatever it was called back then.
